articles.author: Maureen Groppe, Lauren Villagran, Sudiksha Kochi
articles.title: Trump, Biden competing views on democracy threats, Jan. 6 anniversary - USA TODAY
articles.description: A "beautiful day" or the day "that we nearly lost America"? Trump's and Biden's different views of Jan. 6, 2021, are central to their candidacies.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON For Donald Trump, Jan. 6, 2021, was a beautiful day. For Joe Biden, it was the day "we nearly lost America."
As the nation passed the third anniversary of the nation's most serious insurr… [+6615 chars]

articles.author: NEWS WIRES
articles.title: Trump says he will win US presidency 'for third time' on anniversary of Capitol riot - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: Donald Trump hit the campaign trail Saturday in the first-in-the-nation presidential nominating state of Iowa, vowing to win "for the third time" as Americans marked the anniversary of the deadly assault on the US Capitol by a mob of his supporters.
